2025.context: Zscaler, Inc. is a cloud security company focused on Zero Trust security, secure web gateway, and CASB. Zero Trust leader. Competing with Palo Alto, Netskope.

competitors.name: Palo Alto Networks (Prisma Access)
competitors.notes: Prominent competitor offering comprehensive SASE solution through Prisma Access platform. Recognized as a 3x Leader in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for SASE Platforms. Competes with broad security portfolio and enterprise market presence.

competitors.name: Netskope
competitors.notes: Simplifies management of cloud platforms including Office 365, Box, and Dropbox. Provides suite of risk assessment and threat discovery tools. Cited by Gartner's 2025 SSE Magic Quadrant at the top alongside Zscaler, Fortinet, and Palo Alto. Strong in cloud access security broker (CASB) capabilities.

competitors.name: Cloudflare
competitors.notes: Offers Internet-native SSE/SASE (ZTNA, SWG, CASB, isolation, DEM) delivered on global anycast network with 310+ edge locations. Better than Zscaler for user-perceived speed and rollout simplicity with simple 'VPN-off' deployments. Named a Visionary in Gartner's 2025 SASE Magic Quadrant. Features post-quantum cryptography in Access and Gateway.

competitors.name: Cisco (Umbrella & Secure Access)
competitors.notes: Integral to Cisco's SASE architecture offering robust protection against online threats. Best for Cisco-centric networks wanting one agent for AnyConnect, SD-WAN, and SSE. New unified management plane and IPv6 improvements landed July 2025.

competitors.name: Cato Networks (Cato SASE Cloud)
competitors.notes: Single-vendor SASE built on SLA-backed global private backbone. Seamlessly integrates data centers, branch offices, mobile users, and cloud resources. Incorporates enterprise-grade network security stack. Recognized as a 2025 Gartner SASE Magic Quadrant Leader.

competitors.name: Fortinet (FortiSASE)
competitors.notes: Excels in hybrid infrastructure support and customization compared to Zscaler's cloud-native focus. Cited at the top of Gartner's 2025 SSE Magic Quadrant alongside Zscaler, Netskope, and Palo Alto.

competitors.name: Microsoft
competitors.notes: Competes with integrated security solutions across Microsoft 365 and Azure ecosystem. Offers SASE capabilities through Microsoft Entra and Microsoft Defender portfolio.

competitors.name: Akamai Technologies
competitors.notes: Leverages global content delivery network infrastructure to deliver security services. Competes in zero trust and edge security with cloud-delivered SASE capabilities.

competitors.name: Forcepoint
competitors.notes: Provides cloud security and data protection solutions competing in the SSE and SASE space with focus on data security and user behavior analytics.

competitors.name: Citrix
competitors.notes: Offers secure access and networking solutions competing in workspace and application delivery with integrated security capabilities.

mentionedBy.name: Palo Alto Networks Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Cloud-native security platform offering a fundamentally different approach to traditional firewalls. For the first time positioning its zero trust platform as a firewall replacement for large enterprises and U.S. government agencies. Challenges the concept of perimeter-based security.
